languages.text: "Открой реликварий, я попробую разгадать тайну сферы".
"Open the reliquary. I am going to try to solve the mystery of the orb."
languages.original_text: "Открой реликварий, я попробую разгадать тайну сферы".

languages.text: « Ouvrez le reliquaire. Je vais essayer de résoudre le mystère de l'orbe. »
languages.original_text: "Open the reliquary. I am going to try to solve the mystery of the orb."

traits.locale_text: « Ouvrez le reliquaire. Je vais essayer de résoudre le mystère de l'orbe. »

languages.text: «Abra el relicario. Voy a tratar de resolver el misterio del orbe».
languages.original_text: "Open the reliquary. I am going to try to solve the mystery of the orb."

traits.locale_text: «Abra el relicario. Voy a tratar de resolver el misterio del orbe».

languages.text: “打开圣骨匣，我要试试能不能破解这个神秘的圆球。”
languages.original_text: "Open the reliquary. I am going to try to solve the mystery of the orb."

traits.locale_text: “打开圣骨匣，我要试试能不能破解这个神秘的圆球。”

languages.text: 「聖遺物箱を開けて。オーブの謎を解こうと思う」
languages.original_text: "Open the reliquary. I am going to try to solve the mystery of the orb."

traits.locale_text: 「聖遺物箱を開けて。オーブの謎を解こうと思う」

languages.text: "Öffnet das Reliquiar. Ich werde versuchen, das Geheimnis der Kugel zu lösen."
languages.original_text: "Open the reliquary. I am going to try to solve the mystery of the orb."

traits.locale_text: "Öffnet das Reliquiar. Ich werde versuchen, das Geheimnis der Kugel zu lösen."

languages.text: "Kutsal emanet odasını aç. Kürenin gizemini çözeceğim."
